2.name: hide.bs.toast
2.description: This event is fired immediately when the hide instance method has been called.

3.name: hidden.bs.toast
3.description: This event is fired when the toast has finished being hidden from the user.

4.name: show.bs.toast
4.description: This event fires immediately when the show instance method is called.

5.name: shown.bs.toast
5.description: This event is fired when the toast has been made visible to the user.
